<!--title-->
# Build.MindsEye
<!--text-->
Welcome to Build.MindsEye - a creation platform of limitless possibilities, combining 3D visual scripting, a growing library of ready-to-use assets, and built-in publishing tools—all within a collaborative environment of MindsEye!

At its core, Build.MindsEye is designed to help PC creators of all skill levels build, remix, and share interactive experiences - without needing to write a single line of code. Everything happens inside an ARC, your dedicated project space for designing scenes, logic, systems, or full games.

Key components of Build.MindsEye include:

**1. Visual Scripting**
Use logic nodes to define behaviors, systems, and interactions—no coding required. These nodes live in an expandable library you can browse, combine, and customize as you build.

**2. Asset Library**
Tap into a growing collection of models, sounds, UI elements, and gameplay systems. Assets can be used out of the box or tailored to fit your creative vision.

**3. Stamps and Remixing**
Collaborate creatively with Stamps - modular pieces of content that can be reused, remixed, and shared while preserving attribution and version history.

**4. Publishing Tools**
Share your projects directly from within MindsEye. No exports or external setup needed—just publish, play, and let the community dive in or build on your work.

In short, Build.MindsEye is modular, remixable, and creator-first - focused on usability, experimentation, and a thriving community of builders.

Available at no additional cost to all owners of MindsEye on PC!
